members.name: Kye
members.blurb: Our resident physicist and simulation expert. You never know what he's gonna make in godot.

members.name: Gabe
members.blurb: Dabbles in game design, music, bad choices, and more! Has all the up to date knowledge about which games were made in Vancouver.

members.name: Darrick
members.blurb: Hey everyone! I'm Darrick, a Computing Science student at SFU. I play ALOT of FPS games and then hate myself for it afterwards. I don't make games very often but I help made this site (probably)!

members.name: Dave
members.blurb: Writer and roleplaying game enthusiast, with a love of music. I'm there for the story and self-expression through character building. Psychology and Philosophy background. Favourite artists include Tatsuya Yoshikawa, Akiman and Yoshitaka Amano. Vanillaware and Mistwalker two favourite studios. If I were a D&D 5e character I'd be a Lore Bard.

members.name: Arlo
members.blurb: Makes whatever he wants and tries to justify it later. Has a special interest in computer graphics and spends his time rediscovering 20-year-old 3D rendering techniques. Serves as the Game Master for role-playing games set on Torys, a fantasy setting he is continuously developing. Loves the SFU Game Developer's Club and everyone in it.
members.fav-game: Wizardry: Proving Grounds of the Mad Overlord

members.name: Ekam
members.blurb: Just starting out in game development. Currently being assassinated by SIAT (game!) projects but trying to learn and make something small in Unity on the side.
